DOC.brief_summary: Acute low back pain common disorder general practice . Some general practitioner ( GPs ) treat acute low back pain ( LBP ) acupuncture , despite lack evidence effectiveness condition . The aim study evaluate whether single treatment-session acupuncture reduce time recovery apply addition standard LBP-treatment accord Norwegian national guideline . Analyses prognostic factor recovery cost-effectiveness also carry . The investigator hypothesis : 1 . Acupuncture treatment contribute faster pain-recovery acute LBP compare standard treatment general practice provide accordance Norwegian national guideline . 2 . Acupuncture treatment acute LBP improve function , reduces drug use sick leave , compare standard treatment general practice provide accordance national guideline . 3 . Acupuncture treatment acute LBP cost-effective treatment general practice . The investigator intend include total 270 patient , 135 intervention group 135 control group . The investigator plan interim analysis reach inclusion 150 patient . However , might lead reduce overall significance level , result slow inclusion rate ( December 2015 ) , investigator plan extend inclusion time one year complete study March 2017 .
DOC.brief_title: Acupuncture Acute Nonspecific Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: Adults ( 2055 year ) contact general practitioner office acute nonspecific low back pain ( 014 day ) . Nerve root affection and/or radiate pain knee . Low back pain suspect `` red flag '' , i.e . infection , tumor metastatic disease , rheumatic disease , fracture significant deformity spine . Low back pain start pregnancy . Physician report sick leave 14 day last month back pain , reason .
